original_text: Jesus replied, ‘You are happy when people like you. You want them to think that you are good people. But God sees inside you. He knows what you are thinking. The things that many people think are valuable are not valuable to God. He hates those things.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 너희는 사람 앞에서 스스로 옳다 하는 자들이나 너희 마음을 하나님께서 아시나니 사람 중에 높임을 받는 그것은 하나님 앞에 미움을 받는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: You are happy when people like you
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 당신을 좋아할 때 당신은 행복합니다

sentences.original_text: You want them to think that you are good people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 당신이 좋은 사람이라고 생각하게 하기를 원합니다

sentences.original_text: He knows what you are thinking
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 당신이 무엇을 생각하는지 알고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: The things that many people think are valuable
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 가치 있다고 생각하는 것들
